room_title: Escape room "Lost In Space" by MindBreak Norwich in Norwich
room_description: After waking from deep cryofreeze sleep, you and the rest of your crew find that your captain is missing and that you are lost and hurtling through deep space. The clues to his whereabouts and the means to a safe outcome lie within your space capsule. You’ll need to work together to ensure you don’t end up lost in space forever.
